title: Good ping and fps, extreme lag.
body:
So I'm playing league with a friend of mine and I seem to be like two minutes behind him and everyone else. My ping is around 60ms and I get about 100fps. Champions and minions are teleporting everywhere but I'm moving smoothly. I described whats going on in lane to my friend and he'd tell me that extremely different things were happening on his screen. For him the enemy would be beating me under tower, but on my screen I'd be in lane alone. Chat doesn't show up until a few minutes after whats been said and when my friend said that I'd died, it wouldn't actually say I'd died until a little later. After I died on his screen, I would occasionally teleport back and forth from spawn to lane but I wouldn't actually be dead until it came up on my screen. Minions wont spawn until around 4 minutes, first blood comes up ages after my friend says it has and when I level up an ability it takes 2 levels to take effect.   
I'm in the same place on both of our screens so he can give me a good idea of whats happening to me so I can move, I've been randomly pressing w in lane under tower hoping that it does something. The game is pretty much unplayable at this point. This has happened for 2 games in a row, both as Sona support, and its really pissing me off. Disconnecting and reconnecting does nothing to help either. It does this in custom games also.
Please help me.

replies.body:
Hey guys,

It's possible you're experiencing high packet loss and/or packet buffering, I recommend you both take a look at the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) page, specifically attempt the fixes outlined under the [Packet Buffering](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq7) and [Packet Loss](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq6) headings.

Hope this helps.
In the same boat here for roughly the last month, with s6 around the corner, i hope this is fixed.
